about_the_game:
Enter the world of CHORDIOID and get a taste of the action in CHORDIOID: First Breath, a demo spanning the opening chapter of the full game.

Your name is SAM MARDOT, and you've found yourself In the outer reaches of the Capital, a long way from home. Fight enemies, explore the quiet streets of Ring 3, and try your best to put the pieces together in your head.

The answers are out there.



  • Experience the opening act of CHORDIOID's story and world
  • Get a solid taste of the full gameplay loop - fight, talk, explore, shop, go nuts
  • Battle to the beat in a unique, rhythm-based battle system
  • Evocative animated cutscenes that tell an intriguing story full of mystery
  • A lovingly-composed original soundtrack spanning a variety of genres
  • Pronouns in bio

content_descriptors.notes:
This demo contains allusions to various mental health issues, in addition to casual use of strong language and profanity, and may not be suitable for all audiences.

It also contains occasional flashing lights, which may cause discomfort and/or harm to those with photosensitive epilepsy. These effects can be disabled in the accessibility settings.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux distribution released after 2016
  • Processor: 13th Gen Intel i5-1340P or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics with Vulkan 1.0 support
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux distribution released after 2016
  • Processor: 13th Gen Intel i5-1340P or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics with Vulkan 1.2 support
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
